article_title: LG Health and University of Pennsylvania Health System form partnership
article_text: Cindy Stauffer is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer. She can be reached at cstauffer@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6024. You can also follow @cindystauffer on Twitter.

og.description: Two organizations will colloborate on specialized care, and also work to keep patients healthy.
